item.title: Chinese Lidar Maker Hesai Jumps in Hong Kong Debut
item.description: Hesai Group, the world’s largest maker of lidar sensors used in cars, soared in its trading debut in Hong Kong. The company’s co-founder and CEO, David Li, says the company is also eyeing leadership i

item.title: Hesai Jumps in Hong Kong Debut After $535 Million Listing
item.description: Hesai Group, the world’s largest maker of lidar sensors used in cars, rose in its Hong Kong trading debut after its HK$4.2 billion ($535 million) listing in the city.

item.title: What Drove Chinese Lidar Maker Hesai's Robust 2Q Results
